quahog 1.0.0
  • Reference

    Create mzkit config file from defaults

    mzkit_config_file_from_default.Rd

    Create mzkit config file from defaults

    mzkit_config_file_from_default(
  default_config_path,
  methodId,
  export_file_path,
  rt_alignment_file_override = "",
  spline_ridge_penalty = 20,
  is_alignment = TRUE,
  is_splitting = FALSE,
  is_coelution = TRUE,
  is_search = TRUE,
  is_qc = TRUE,
  is_eda = TRUE,
  reference_sample_override = NULL,
  is_exclude_isotopes = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    default_config_path

    path to a default config file

    methodId

    mass spectrometry method being run (e.g., M001A)

    export_file_path

    path to new config file

    rt_alignment_file_override

    path to an alignment file or an empty string to ignore

    spline_ridge_penalty

    spline_ridge_penalty Ridge penalty on sample-level splines which model deviations between observed retention times and the consensus rt of a compound.

    is_alignment

    should alignment be performed?

    is_splitting

    should splitting be corrected?

    is_coelution

    should coelutions be found?

    is_search

    should search be performed?

    is_qc

    should QC be performed?

    is_eda

    should EDA be performed?

    reference_sample_override

    NULL to skip or the name of a reference sample

    is_exclude_isotopes

    should isotopologues be excluded?

    Value

    writes a json config to export_file_path

    Contents

    Developed by Sean Hackett, Phillip Seitzer.
